text: Is there a way to only show a popup modal if a visitor isn’t a customer already on a website?
I’m looking at smart content ATM but not sure if that can do what I need
I am using create-react-app to spin up a sample React page however I am unable to generate images.  The image source URL is relative.
How can I match the relative URL so that it reads the file saved in the File Manager instead of prepending the live domain to the relative path?
Hi everyone! what's the usual workflow for building websites? Can I build it in my sandbox account and then export it to a client or should I build directly inside of client account?

<@UMN2YJ3K9> If developing in secondary account make sure there are no hardcoded links (images or files) as these will inevitably disappear from the developer's HS account.  This may be obvious, but it is my personal experience that sites break a year or two down the road if this is not strictly followed.
I have built templates in my portal and migrated them over.
Thank You! I'm new, but wanted to make sure the worked before taking the next steps.
Mostly tho. I do work directly in my clients portal.
I stage payments a certain mile stones so im not doing more than im getting paid for
and anything smaller gets paid up front
